alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Miller; Nevada; Sevier; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 13 at 12:06PM CDT until April 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 120 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS UNION IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS COLUMBIA HEMPSTEAD HOWARD LAFAYETTE LITTLE RIVER MILLER NEVADA SEVIER IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 PARISHES IN NORTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA JACKSON LINCOLN UNION WINN IN NORTHWEST LOUISIANA BIENVILLE BOSSIER CADDO CLAIBORNE DE SOTO NATCHITOCHES RED RIVER SABINE WEBSTER IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 18 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS ANGELINA BOWIE CAMP CASS CHEROKEE GREGG HARRISON MARION MORRIS NACOGDOCHES PANOLA RUSK SABINE SAN AUGUSTINE SHELBY SMITH TITUS UPSHUR THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARCADIA, ASHDOWN, ATLANTA, BERNICE, BIG SANDY, BOSSIER CITY, BRADLEY, CARTHAGE, CENTER, COUSHATTA, DAINGERFIELD, DE QUEEN, DIERKS, EL DORADO, FARMERVILLE, GIBSLAND, GILMER, HAYNESVILLE, HEMPHILL, HENDERSON, HOMER, HOPE, HUGHES SPRINGS, JACKSONVILLE, JEFFERSON, JONESBORO, LEWISVILLE, LINDEN, LOGANSPORT, LONE STAR, LONGVIEW, LUFKIN, MAGNOLIA, MANSFIELD, MANY, MARSHALL, MARTIN, MINDEN, MINERAL SPRINGS, MOUNT PLEASANT, NACOGDOCHES, NAPLES, NASHVILLE, NATCHITOCHES, OMAHA, PINELAND, PITTSBURG, PLEASANT HILL, PRESCOTT, QUEEN CITY, RINGGOLD, RUSK, RUSTON, SAN AUGUSTINE, SHREVEPORT, SPRINGHILL, STAMPS, STONEWALL, TEXARKANA, TEXARKANA, TYLER, WINNFIELD, AND ZWOLLE.
